widgets_values: A cinematic, hyper-realistic full-body shot of a young woman with vibrant teal-blue hair and extensive, detailed black-ink tattoos across her chest, neck, wearing a wizard robe, walking towards the fireplace away from the table.

nodes.title: Youtube.com/@RareTutor
widgets_values:
Low  Vram    : 640 x 360    -> Final Video after Upscale : 1280 x 720   (720p HD)
Mid  Vram    : 960 x 512    -> Final Video after Upscale : 1080 x 1024 (Full HD)
High Vram    : 1280 x 704   -> Final Video after Upscale : 2560 x 1408 (2K)
V. High Vram : 1920 x 1024  -> Final Video after Upscale : 3840 x 2048 (4K)
